short_summary: Harbour entrance improvement work to be conducted at Fox Island River in Newfoundland and Labrador
description: The work covered under this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material required for the Harbour Entrance Improvements at Fox Island River, Newfoundland and Labrador.  In general, work under this contract will consist of, but will not necessarily be limited to, the following: \\[1. Excavation/dredging. The disposal area for the dredged material is noted on the drawings. \\[2. Construction of a rubble mound breakwater/groyne, complete with core, filter stone and armour stone. Note that any loose sediments existing on the harbour bottom ("+/\- 300mm) are to be removed and a polypropylene geogrid placed in the breakwater footprint prior to placing any core material. \\[3.  Not specified, possibly in the following format: TJXnnnn.4 " the average low-bid and highest high-bid \\u00f4f /$/100*$_Vertex and TJXnnnn.6.  Based on an average of the 40 (\u00b110.19) inclusive interval. \\[2. Hedge lines/bottle rack \
full_summary:
### Title
#### English: F6140-230317 - Harbour Entrance Improvement – Fox Island River, NL
#### French: F6140-230317 - Amélioration de l’entrée du port – Rivière Fox Island (T.-N.-L.)

### Tender Information
* Reference Number: WS4128424472 (Doc4128484559)
* Solicitation Number: WS4128424472
* Publication Date: 2023-08-02
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-22T14:00:00 (Expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expiré
* UNSPSC: 
	+ 72140000 - Heavy construction services
	+ 72141200 - Marine construction services
	+ 72141206 - Dredging services

### Procurement Information
* Category: CNST
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify (English), Invitation à se qualifier (French)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering (English), Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif (French)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price (English), Prix le plus bas (French)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

### Project Information
* Project Location: Fox Island River, Newfoundland and Labrador
* Estimated Value: $1,000,001 to $5,000,000
* Expected Delivery Date: 50 weeks after contract award

### Contact Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada
* Contact Person: Dwyer, Alexandria (SPAC/PSPC), alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Resources
* Notice URL (English): http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17053499?extsite=MTcwNTM0OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Notice URL (French): http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/
